name: Divide et Impera
description:
There is place only for one kingdom!

To go back to the menu while you are in game you can surrender by destroying your own palace!

Knights stats:

Knight: Life/Damage: 5 Move speed: 9 cost: 7

LightKnight: Life/Damage: 3 Move speed: 14 cost: 5

HeavyKnight: Life/Damage: 10 Move speed: 5 cost: 10
